title: IFRC Data Initiatives
lead: IFRC is a data-driven organization dedicated to making evidence-based decision-making

about.title: About Data
about.text: IFRC is aggregating its data and data literacy efforts in this prototype website. Please provide feedback to:

fdrs.title: FDRS
fdrs.text: The Federation-wide Databank and Reporting System provides data about all the National Societies.

go.title: Go Project
go.text: Go is building a virtual Emergency Operations Center.

literacy.title: Data Literacy
literacy.text: Building collective understanding of how to collect, analyze, and visualize data.

dref.title: DREFs & Appeals
dref.text: Visualization of current and historic Disaster Relief Emergency Fund requests and appeals.
